channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-17724] PyFlink end-to-end test fails with Cannot run program "venv.zip/.conda/bin/python": error=2, No such file or directory

item.summary: PyFlink end-to-end test fails with Cannot run program "venv.zip/.conda/bin/python": error=2, No such file or directory

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I assigned you.

Another case on master: https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=1377&view=logs&j=c88eea3b-64a0-564d-0031-9fdcd7b8abee&t=1e2bbe5b-4657-50be-1f07-d84bfce5b1f5
